parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Artillery </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get list of all available magazines of artillery units on the list. Command returns only unique magazine types and doesn't contain any information about which unit has which magazine. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getArtilleryAmmo''' [unit1, unit2, unit3....] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [unit1, unit2, unit3....]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[String]]s </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ("8Rnd_82mm_Mo_Flare_white" [[in]] [[getArtilleryAmmo]] [
	_mortar1,
	_mortar2,
	_mortar3, 
	_mortar4
]) [[then]] {
	[[hint]] "Sir, we have white flares, sir!";
};</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[getArtilleryETA]], [[commandArtilleryFire]], [[doArtilleryFire]], [[enableEngineArtillery]], [[getArtilleryComputerSettings]], [[shownArtilleryComputer]], [[inRangeOfArtillery]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
